branchCategory.name: JXC*1, Step Motor Controller, Fieldbus Direct Input Type for LEY
branchCategory.description: <p>The JXC91 is a single axis controller for LE's 24VDC step motors compatible with Ethernet/IP fieldbus. Actuator motors can be operated by calling a line of step data or by direct numerical instruction, each possible over the network.  Futher Ethernet/IP capable functions include return to origin, alarm outputs and resets, parameter setup, status monitoring, and trial runs.</p>

breadCrumb.name: JXC*1, Step Motor Controller, Fieldbus Direct Input Type for LEY
